newsitem.title: GERMANY: Thyssen sees steel merger profit in 97.
newsitem.headline: Thyssen sees steel merger profit in 97.

text.p: German industrial group Thyssen AG said on Thursday it expected its newly founded steel venture with Fried. Krupp AG to turn a profit this year.
"The company will be profitable right from the start," Thyssen chief Dieter Vogel said at a news conference. When asked if that meant 1997, he replied, "Yes."
